column1: The Trump and Biden Administrations must work together now to ensure a successful transition of power so that the Biden-Harris Administration is ready on day one to tackle #COVID19 the economic crisis and ongoing challenges in America.

Thank you so much to all our #PublicHealth workers who have been putting others' needs ahead of their own every day since the start of the #COVID19 pandemic.  You are all real heroes. #PublicHealthThankYouDay

You might not have received the check or automatic payment you're entitled to as part of the CARES Act. The deadline to apply for a COVID-19 stimulus check is November 21. Use the IRS Non-Filer Tool to find out if you’re eligible: https://t.co/jCa7xSPmcF https://t.co/5hvvtTZZB2

Since March our phones have been ringing off the hook with calls from Floridians who are struggling to make it through the health & economic crises caused by #COVID19.  We can't let any American who qualifies for assistance fall through the cracks!  https://t.co/QyvLZhnwrx

While I'm optimistic about the promising #COVID19 vaccine trial news we must remain vigilant!  This pandemic is not over. Please keep wearing your mask wash your hands frequently & practice social distancing when possible

The Trump Administration continues to wage a dangerous war on women’s health even as we fight #COVID19 by requesting to expand the deadly Global #GagRule which threatens #healthcare access for millions of women and girls around the world.  https://t.co/eF79H5nbMB

#COVID19 doesn't discriminate & ignoring it doesn't make it go away.  @GovRonDeSantis is putting #LocalGov in a corner by preventing the hardest hit areas in FL from taking actions needed to slow down the spread.  It's dangerous & irresponsible!  https://t.co/VNojUlJNSM

President Trump and Republicans are continuing their attacks on the Affordable Care Act today at the Supreme Court—in the middle of the #COVID19 pandemic! The #healthcare of millions is at stake.   We must #SaveTheACA. https://t.co/FIx52PABDx

Days after winning the election President-elect Biden has already announced a #COVID19 taskforce full of leading experts in the field.  This is what leadership looks like.  It’s time for America to put this virus in a box now let’s get to work! https://t.co/aKh2jEVdeq
State-by-state information is not enough.   #COVID19 doesn’t stop at state lines!   We need FULL transparency from @HHSgov in order to keep our #healthcare system from becoming overwhelmed!

Let me get this straight.   @realdonaldtrump stripped @CDCgov of its ability to collect #COVID19 data in July letting @HHSGov take over.  Now months later we're learning that they had a nation-wide analysis that they weren't sharing?  https://t.co/NRtdBymaWW

.@aijenpoo hit the nail on the head in this @TIME story.   If we want our economy to truly & equitably recover from #COVID19 investments in #childcare #PaidLeave & services to help seniors & those with disabilities live with dignity are a requirement!  https://t.co/VE9a8twFYY

Spoke with @WendyRhodesFl about the work my team & I have been doing to help the #PBC community get through #COVID19.  These are difficult times but I know we will get through this together.  https://t.co/iP2aWjp4qG
Trump & Republicans have stalled on critical #COVID19 relief yet raced to install a justice to #SCOTUS who threatens #healthcare for millions.

1 in 5 working-age adults is unemployed because Covid-19 upended their #childcare with women three times more likely than men to remain home with kids. The House did its part to help working mothers with the #HEROESAct - when will the Senate and the President act? #momsbailout https://t.co/wedrl8cXb6
Especially as the international community continues to battle #COVID19 countries should be reinforcing their commitments to the health & safety of women & girls not leaving them more vulnerable!

Dr. Stanley Plotkin is known as the "Godfather of Vaccines" for his work developing the Rubella vaccine in the 1960s and I had the chance to sit down and chat with him over Zoom about the possibility of a #COVID19 vaccine!   Watch ⤵  https://t.co/YJ9ru1usEB

Did you know today is #worldhandwashingday?   No better time to practice your handwashing skills to help protect yourself & others from the spread of #COVID19.   Use warm water soap lather for at least 20 seconds & follow @CDCgov guidance!   https://t.co/8ShCN4EyWV

It's not too late to sign up for my Video Town Hall tonight on WebEx! You can register at the link below and join me tonight at 6:00pm to have your questions about #COVID19 & vaccines answered. Talk to you then! https://t.co/bpeE0FboaT https://t.co/eJXsEB0DoC

Join me tomorrow night at 6:00pm for a live WebEx town hall with Dr. Stanley Plotkin the "Godfather of Vaccines" to discuss the search for a #COVID19 vaccine.   Register here: https://t.co/bpeE0FboaT https://t.co/qikG1vAvmm

I was Mayor of West Palm Beach for 8 years so I understand how delicate a #localgov budget can be. #COVID19 has hit our local & state govs hard & if we don’t get them relief millions of jobs & the services we rely on will be at risk.  Americans need relief now! #HeroesAct https://t.co/avH6kPmK1y

It's no secret that #COVID19 has impacted the #MentalHealth of many Americans who are struggling due to the pandemic.   Please know that there are resources available to you & your loved ones which you can learn more here #MIAW ⤵   https://t.co/b8ckTLeoGt
#COVID19 has devastated the health & finances of American families. Our updated #HeroesAct includes urgently needed new funding to respond to this deepening crisis.   https://t.co/Lnz8p1z40E

The updated #HeroesAct makes good on @HouseDemocrats’ offers to compromise to address the health & economic catastrophe in our country.   @SenateGOP must finally negotiate & pass a bill that protects our heroes crushes #COVID19 & puts money in people’s pockets. https://t.co/KRwfbhElO6

It is rushed and deadly for Governor DeSantis to remove state-level restrictions and undermine local mask ordinances. Health experts say face coverings are one of the best ways to slow the spread of COVID-19 and keep each other safe.  https://t.co/TZob3oWqyZ
Instead of healing divisions @GovRonDeSantis is trying to distract from @realDonaldTrump’s attempt to repeal the #ACA and his incompetent response to the #COVID19 pandemic.   https://t.co/Nkr9bMB9mr

#COVID19 has led to the deaths of more than 200000 Americans.  This is the grim reality we're living in because @realdonaldtrump decided to undermine the pandemic & #publichealth leaders from the start.  He failed us all.  https://t.co/SKJVqToXrX
Not only are seniors at high risk from #COVID19 itself but the isolation dementia & Alzheimer's patients are enduring can be deadly.   https://t.co/bMCBxnHWYl

During last night's town hall we heard from TWO local doctors who stressed the importance of everyone even young people getting a flu vaccine this season.  We cannot afford a "twindemic" of the flu & #COVID19. Please get vaccinated at your local pharmacy or doctor's office! https://t.co/gooaIlNjJf

It's not too late to sign up for my first Video Town Hall tonight on WebEx!   You can register at the link below and join me tonight at 6:30pm to have your questions about #COVID19 & school re-openings answered. Talk to you then!  https://t.co/P3pBoezDo0 https://t.co/Idephw9KG9

Join me tomorrow night at 6:30pm for a live WebEx town hall with local educators doctors and leaders to discuss what back to school during #COVID19 means for you and your family. Register here: https://t.co/P3pBoezDo0

#COVID19 has impacted all our lives & now that schools are back in session here in #PBC many residents are left wondering what this new reality means.  I'll be joined by experts to answer your questions on Thurs Sept 17 at 6:30pm during a WebEx town hall https://t.co/P3pBoezDo0 https://t.co/RVxcdnyVkn

The #GlobalGagRule interrupts critical #healthcare around the world yet @realdonaldtrump is asking for its expansion during a pandemic.  He should be focusing on fighting #COVID19 not attacking access to health care in other countries.   https://t.co/PoPL4SP4Ev

A historic national tragedy has occurred because @realDonaldTrump chose to hide the truth about #COVID19. He was fully aware of the catastrophic nature of the virus & that it was airborne but he left our entire country exposed and unprepared.   https://t.co/TVkzqq1gJL https://t.co/yxmJmt8xJ9

#TrumpKnew in FEBRUARY that #COVID19 was deadly & he did NOTHING.  Think of the lives that could have been saved. The funerals that didn't need to happen. The loved ones who would still be alive.  He turned his back on America when he chose to "play it down." https://t.co/Fc1gkdH2K9

With all of the crises caused by #COVID19 the #CaregivingCrisis is constantly overlooked.   #CourageousCaregivers like @BuffyWicks (who brought her newborn to the CA house to vote on #paidleave) are juggling #childcare & jobs during a PANDEMIC. It's time we fight for them too.

The #HeroesAct would help our frontline heroes feed hungry families help renters stay in their homes ensure safe voting & more.   116 days later & Republicans are proposing we vote on emaciated #COVID-19 "plan" just to check a box?   No thanks. #FamiliesFirst https://t.co/56iENT3491

This #LaborDay we remember all who have fought hard for workers’ rights.   @HouseDemocrats will always live by our commitment to fight for American workers--especially during this #COVID19 pandemic. https://t.co/eLRQCak4Bu

Attention #PBC families:  If your child lost access to free or reduced-price meals due to #COVID19-related school closures you may be eligible for up to $313.50 for groceries per child. If you have not received this P-EBT support call 1-833-311-0321 today.
Today I met with local leaders school staff and parents to discuss the need for #HeroesAct funding to help schools struggling due to #COVID19.   https://t.co/8CsO3iMoPn

Today I'm excited to announce two grants worth a total of $600000 to Wellington & Palm Springs for a new playground installation soccer field & more.   Outdoor recreation is so important especially during #COVID19 & I'm excited to see these projects completed! https://t.co/LO8Nftq4q0

Congress has provided robust funding to make sure that every American who needs a test can get one because that's the best way to put #COVID19 in a box & beat this virus.   So why would @CDCGov change its guidance now?   We need answers. https://t.co/HJzkbPdTPZ

The new @CDCgov guidelines on #COVID19 testing are gravely concerning.   This pandemic is very real--it's killed +180000 Americans & we're still struggling to get it under control.   Testing for asymptomatic cases is CRUCIAL to tracking its spread.   https://t.co/T8vM8n5rO0
Today’s decision will help keep students teachers and staff safe as we continue to fight #COVID19 in South Florida.   https://t.co/Q7dkRp7oOb

At a time when @USPS is strained by the effects of #COVID19 @realDonaldTrump – enabled by his top mega-donor Postmaster General Louis DeJoy – is waging a campaign to sabotage the USPS degrading service and delaying the mail.

It's been 100 years since the 19th Amendment was ratified granting some women the right to vote.   On this anniversary it’s more important than ever that we protect hard-won voting rights by making sure EVERY American can vote safely during the #COVID19 pandemic.

It's taken until TODAY for the average Black woman to earn what her white male colleagues did in 2019 a #wagegap that has only grown wider due to #COVID19.   We must recommit to fighting for #EconomicJustice & #EqualPay especially for women of color. #BlackWomensEqualPay
Today I joined my fellow @HouseDemWomen for a robust discussion on the need to #RaiseTheWage of Women of Color--especially during #COVID19. Watch the full round table here. ⤵ https://t.co/ohtKhsdJJv

#COVID19 has had devastating health & economic impacts on women & families—especially women of color who disproportionately work in industries that are losing jobs.   @HouseDemocrats passed the #HeroesAct MONTHS ago to ease this burden. @SenateGOP must #PassTheHeroesAct! https://t.co/o5RULOZiMn

#COVID19 continues to wreak havoc on America.   ➡️5 million cases.  ➡️160000 dead.  ➡️55 million first-time unemployment claims.   We can't afford anymore of @realdonaldtrump's #FailureToLead. Republicans need to head back to the table to negotiate with Democrats now!

With older adults & people with disabilities at higher risk of #COVID19 complications @SenateGOP is pushing:  ❌ unprecedented & unconstitutional immunity provisions ❌ eliminating federal employment & civil rights protections ❌ ‘three martini lunches’

Any #COVID19 emergency package MUST include funding for the @USPS.   Americans are relying on this essential service for delivery of medication goods as well as their votes and we cannot let it be driven into the ground! https://t.co/b8hp0UVD3e
Tonight at 6:00pm I’ll be joined by experts to answer your questions about #COVID19.  Register at the link below to join the conversation.  https://t.co/yruKQhPDeu https://t.co/rVf9UJtVhH

Join me & local experts including an infectious disease doctor tomorrow night at 6pm for a telephone town hall where we'll answer your #COVID19 questions.   Register below or tune in live on my Facebook page & ask your questions in the comments. https://t.co/yruKQhy2mW https://t.co/VkEOSX0nhY

As #COVID19 cases soar across the United States including here in Florida women of color are at an increased risk of contracting and dying from the virus.   @SenateMajLdr stop playing games and do your job – pass the #HeroesAct NOW! https://t.co/ZHe0WoigGt

When will there be a #COVID19 vaccine? Are schools reopening? What financial relief is available?   Tomorrow I'll be joined by experts to take all your #coronavirus questions during a telephone town hall. Register below to take part in the conversation.  https://t.co/yruKQhPDeu https://t.co/mPZ8CimYQB

It rejects the proposed cuts of critical programs in @POTUS' budget & instead prioritizes #publichealth & safety; invests in #cleanenergy; invests in education & job training; addresses #policereform; supports service members &military families; & combats #COVID19.

Today I voted for a spending package that invests #ForThePeople providing strong funding for programs that expand opportunities for every person in every corner of the nation and responding to the #COVID19 crisis.  https://t.co/6MzXjKwd7G

Weekly federal unemployment payments end TODAY but the economic devastation caused by the #COVID19 pandemic is still raging.   It’s past time for the Senate to act and #PassTheHeroesAct now to help MILLIONS of families keep a roof over their head & food on their table! https://t.co/WwjpsJG5Pd

One lesson the #COVID19 pandemic has made alarming clear is that paid leave is absolutely necessary for all workers. That’s why we extended #PaidLeave benefits in the #HeroesAct https://t.co/ScjP5hShQJ

With #COVID19 still raging it's even more important that we fund mail-in voting which is the SAME as absentee voting to ensure Americans aren't choosing between their rights & their health.  The Senate MUST #PassTheHeroesAct to fund this critical tool of Democracy!

Trump doesn't have the power to stop the election. Nor is there evidence that vote by mail is fraudulent. He's just diverting attention from rising #COVID19 infections & unemployment.   It's @realDonaldTrump who's “INACCURATE & FRAUDULENT” & “a great embarrassment to the USA.” https://t.co/5bSayaCWFQ

#COVID19 has devastated the child care sector forcing closures & exacerbating the shortage of quality affordable child care in FL.   That’s why @HouseDemocrats are advancing 2️⃣ bills to provide relief for families & providers & reopen the economy safely. #SaveChildCare https://t.co/tnXhaoqz2X

This week millions of Americans will lose crucial unemployment benefits & will be at risk of eviction because of the delayed disastrous response to #COVID19 by @SenateGOP and the @WhiteHouse.  Americans can't afford to wait! #PassTheHeroesAct now!  https://t.co/MhxUCtxaX3

Even before #COVID19 millions of workers were forced to choose between a paycheck & their health because they didn't have #PaidSickLeave.   These stories are all too common.   This new @JECDems report explores the need for comprehensive #paidleave now: https://t.co/1QYc2LrjKp https://t.co/IIjH9XYD3S

The $600 unemployment boost is critical to helping families who are feeling the devastating economic impacts of #COVID19.   For our economy to recover from this crisis we must put families & workers first.   The Senate must #ExtendUi & #PassTheHEROESAct now! #Savethe600 https://t.co/wGofHfSMOL

Wearing a mask helps protect all of us from the spread of #COVID19. It's a way of respecting ourselves and others during this pandemic because at the end of the day we're all in this together! #MaskUpPBC https://t.co/RfrZYcb8kC

I've heard a lot of questions from people in #PBC about when we'll see a #COVID19 cure or vaccine. Earlier this month infectious disease expert @BhadeliaMD gave us some insights. Hear her thoughtful response from my July 2nd telephone town hall below ⤵ https://t.co/eiJhKWscpm

FL is an epicenter of #COVID19 & our seniors are bearing the heartbreaking consequences  In the last month infections rose in nursing homes by 153%.   That's 2868 newly infected nursing home residents.   @GovRonDeSantis - we need a mask mandate now!  https://t.co/j9TIa352rQ

We knew that #LocalGov budgets would suffer from #COVID19.   The #HeroesAct would give them the boost they need to stay afloat during this #publichealth crisis but it's been held up in the Senate since May. We must #PassTheHeroesAct now!   https://t.co/OBtNwst0IS

If you've had (or think you had) #COVID19 here are @CDCgov's guidelines for when you can be around others:  🔟 Wait 10 days since your symptoms first appeared  ⏲ Go 24 hours since you last had a fever with NO medication &  💪 Be feeling better.   https://t.co/lERLMBi8Y9

FL's spike in #COVID19 cases is alarming to say the least. Just yesterday 156 Floridians lost their lives.   156.   And now hospitals are running low on the potentially life-saving drug remdesivir.   Enough politics @GovRonDeSantis we need you to lead.  https://t.co/0l4NKkQzDZ

#COVID19 cases are on the rise in FL.   Sadly @GovRonDeSantis has adopted @realdonaldtrump’s dangerous rhetoric of minimizing the threat of this deadly virus.   Don’t wait for them to change their minds. Protect yourself & others by wearing a mask & listening to @CDCGov. https://t.co/6MNz3r2kdw

More than 30 million Americans who have lost their jobs due to #COVID19 are receiving emergency unemployment benefits through the #CARESAct.   @Senatemajldr is considering letting that benefit expire on July 31. That’s unacceptable. The Senate MUST #PassTheHeroesAct now!

47794 Americans have lost their lives to #COVID19 in the two months since @HouseDemocrats passed the #HeroesAct.   Why is the Senate dragging its feet on this critical legislation that gives American communities the tools to fight this crisis? https://t.co/QQuC1v1QeG

To fight #COVID19 we need accurate data – but @realdonaldtrump’s administration keeps muddying the waters.   Diverting this information from @CDCGov raises serious questions about transparency & further politicizes this #publichealth crisis.    https://t.co/fa6njPVdt0

Hurricanes wreak havoc on our South Florida communities & local budgets & Hurricane Irma was no different.   Today @FEMA announced $7.4 million in grants to #PBC to provide much needed relief to #localgov budgets already stretched thin due to the #COVID19 pandemic.

Today @AppropsDems are marking up our FY21 Defense bill which provides $33.3B for Defense Health Programs including for #COVID19 response & $8.5 million to implement the Women Peace and Security Act to promote women’s participation in peace & security efforts worldwide. https://t.co/HP5IZfHgI1

His attacks on the #ACA come even as millions more Americans are losing their coverage during the #COVID19 pandemic due to enormous job losses.   He’s putting the health of millions of Americans–especially women–at stake.   https://t.co/WKoHzegK4m

Insurance companies used to engage in gender discrimination regularly: charging women more for the same coverage as men & not covering things like pregnancy.   The #ACA changed that–but @RealDonaldTrump wants to repeal it in the middle of #COVID19.  https://t.co/Pr7jIBw0HD

Importantly this bill also directly addresses the devastating impacts of the #COVID19 pandemic on our communities with more money for public health seniors and state unemployment systems. #ForThePeople

The #PPP was established to help struggling #SmallBiz that have been hurt by the #COVID19 pandemic.   We need your help to keep this critical program accountable.   Report fraud waste or abuse of pandemic relief funds at https://t.co/OtQFThOL8r or call 202-225-4400. https://t.co/qvlJMKQMKg

Instead of focusing on how to stop the rapid spread of #COVID19 in FL & fixing our still broken unemployment system the Governor is following Trump’s lead and distancing himself from the reality of this crisis. https://t.co/sb7oBtkPYq

We can't allow millions of Americans impacted by #COVID19 to lose their federal unemployment benefits at the end of this month. I joined a letter urging @realDonaldTrump & @SenateGOP to extend these vital benefits families need to survive this pandemic. https://t.co/wTqBaTNBVW

If there's anything that we've learned from #COVID19 it's how connected the world is.   I'm proud to have helped to pass the SFOPS funding bill for FY 2021 out of the Appropriations Committee today to advance global women’s equality & health & Israel security assistance. https://t.co/vIh5UI9uTW
Florida did not have to become an epicenter of #COVID19.   The failure of leadership at the national and state level has put us in the position we are in now.   https://t.co/0OvTuhC7SM

#COVID19 isn’t something that will just go away.   Our children are feeling long-term impacts. Our first responders are getting sick. Floridians are suffering.   What is it going to take for you to mandate masks @GovRonDeSantis?   https://t.co/QMf31OluJZ

I'm proud to support the LHHS FY 2021 Appropriations Bill that makes a robust investment in every American & includes critical funding for those impacted by #COVID19. It will help fix our broken unemployment system support seniors & fully fund #TitleX.

The decision to leave the @WHO in the middle of the #COVID19 pandemic which has already cost over 130000 Americans their lives is a dangerous one.   @realDonaldTrump you can't pass the buck on this. We need leadership & action not a blame-game. https://t.co/K4CdL24Gqg

Florida is reporting the highest rate of positive #COVID19 tests since the beginning of the pandemic.   @GovRonDeSantis Floridian's LIVES are at risk—lives you can help save by requiring masks be worn in public.   What are you waiting for?  https://t.co/wZ42Tnutn7

This morning I joined my colleagues to call on @GovRonDeSantis to stop using @realDonaldTrump's dangerous & foolhardy #COVID19 rhetoric of "we just have to deal with it" & start telling Floridians the truth: We need a statewide mandate to wear masks to keep Floridians safe! https://t.co/0P5WwFCXFM

Yesterday over 50000 NEW #COVID19 cases were reported in the U.S. the highest number of cases in a single day since the start of the pandemic.   We urgently need more testing & contact tracing.   @senatemajldr it's time to pass the #HeroesAct!  https://t.co/CeUYa4EB2J

.@realdonaldtrump may think he can ignore #COVID19 and pass the buck but Americans know better.   Millions are unemployed. More than 120000 have lost their lives. Cases are still climbing.  It’s time for the Senate to take action & pass the #HeroesAct! https://t.co/0yh3TyOW5b

#COVID19 isn't going away any time soon. What does that mean for you & your loved ones?   Join me and @BhadeliaMD an infectious disease physician from @BUMedicine for a telephone town hall on Thurs. at 6:30pm to ask your questions. https://t.co/NbrEyw6xae https://t.co/YcQEIGwsC9

We are still in the midst of the #Coronavirus pandemic & I want to help you get the answers you need to keep yourself & your family safe.

Nearly 9000 new cases. In just one day.   Florida – the virus is still out there and it’s still serious. Please social distance and wear your mask when you are in public. We are all in this together.  https://t.co/cuPcbCYvY1

Women make up the vast majority of employees in some of the hardest hit industries & have lost 56% of all jobs lost in due to the #Coronavirus pandemic.   How much longer can women wait for the @SenateGOP to take action?   We need the #HeroesAct now!

Know someone you think should be nominated as a #LocalHero for Palm Beach County for their work with the community during the #coronavirus pandemic?  Nominate them using the form below for a chance to have them honored in a future virtual celebration.   https://t.co/NW4JCYlAAN

#Coronavirus cases are spiking & we know that we need MORE testing in order to contain the virus.   @realDonaldTrump's decision to pull federal support for #COVID19 testing sites in hotspot areas  won't make it go away. It just makes Americans less safe.  https://t.co/k88AP1tS6L

I’m proud to support @HouseDemocrats’ new Patient Protection & Affordable Care Enhancement Act.   Especially as we continue to see the devastating impacts of #COVID19 it’s so important that we #LowerCostsForCare for American across the country. #ForThePeople https://t.co/xZxgAvagjW
The LAST thing we need right now is a testing slowdown. The Senate must pass the #HeroesAct to ensure #coronavirus testing is available nationwide! https://t.co/RBo4KRE4f2

.@realDonaldTrump's inability to take #COVID19 seriously from the start has cost over 120000 people in America their lives.  He's spread conspiracy theories refused to wear a mask & ignored #PublicHealth experts for MONTHS but he's "serious" about slowing down testing. Wow. https://t.co/kRIn33wHyw

As #COVID19 continues to spike in FL it is clear @pbcgov must urgently require masks in areas recommended by #publichealth officials to reduce the spread of #coronavirus.  Businesses will not stay open if customers and workers are not healthy & safe.

Centuries of systemic & structural racism has infected all of our institutions. We see it in the rates of #COVID19 deaths our system of mass incarceration & we see it in the harassment & excessive force that people of color routinely face by too many of our police officers.

We are not out of the woods yet.   #COVID19 cases are still on the rise even as #PBC & the rest of Florida continues to open.   Please continue to follow @CDCgov guidelines practice social distancing wash your hands & wear a mask when you go out!   https://t.co/ierbUNrPXy

The #COVID19 pandemic has hit our economy hard as many Americans struggle to pay bills & put food on the table.   #PBC residents that are struggling financially can now apply to receive up to $7000 in rent & utilities assistance. Apply now!   https://t.co/qnOYUBNv0i

We all want our kids to safely return to school. The number of #COVID19 cases in a community & readiness should be key factors for schools to reopen. I urge @GovRonDeSantis to provide mandatory requirements based on scientific evidence & CDC guidelines.  https://t.co/Z0YKDJoNxb
